document.masterDocTitle: Butterflies (Lepidoptera) of Guyana: A compilation of records

subSubSection.paragraph:
1.
Archonias Hübner
, [1831]

a. SUR CK; November, 1993; SF (
Fratello, 1993
and 1996a ) b . MT WK B; February–April, 1999; SF (
Fratello, 1999a as
Archonias bellona
) c. MT AY D; 30 March–27 April , 1999; SF et al . ( Fratello, 1999a and 1999d as
Archonia bellona
) d. RO CON; 5–14 June and 21–31 October, 2009; MK (GSEC, 2010) e. ANNAI; no data available (
Hall, 1939c as
Archonias bellona
) f. MT ROR; no data available (
Hall, 1939c as
Archonias bellona
)

2.

Pieris monuste
;

Beccaloni et al ., 2008
)
